DataShape.description: This capability allows a resource to receive goods at the specified shipping address.
DataShape.name: PTC.Capability.ShippableDataShape

FieldDefinition.description: The city of the shippable resource
FieldDefinition.name: ShippingCity

FieldDefinition.description: The country of the shippable resource
FieldDefinition.name: ShippingCountry

FieldDefinition.description: The geoposition of the shippable resource
FieldDefinition.name: ShippingLocation

FieldDefinition.description: The postal code of the shippable resource
FieldDefinition.name: ShippingPostalCode

FieldDefinition.description: The state of the shippable resource
FieldDefinition.name: ShippingState

FieldDefinition.description: The street address of the shippable resource
FieldDefinition.name: ShippingStreet
